Title: Why Does Horse Keep Standing While Sleeping?
Article:
It would be uncomfortable foe you to sleep standing up, but the opposite is true for horses. You can often find a horse sleeping standing up. It is possible because of their special body design.
Horses have a sort of internal system of tendons and ligaments called stray apparatus. This system lets a horse lock its legs in position, so that it can relax its muscles, and doze off without keeling over.
Even though they’re able to snooze standing up, horses apparently nee to lie down for rest and sleep for at least some of the time.
